entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
